summary: TAKATA RECALL: RECALL NO: 15V-318  HI THERE,  I RECEIVED A NOTICE IN JULY 2015 REGARDING THE DRIVER SIDE FRONT AIRBAG  I CONTACTED MY LOCAL DEALER:  BOB SMITH BMW  24500 CALABASAS RD, CALABASAS, CA 91302-2509    THEY KEEP TELLING ME THAT THEY DO NOT HAVE THE PARTS FOR THEM TO MAKE THE REPAIR.  THIS HAS BEEN 1 YEAR SINCE WE RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTICE.   YOURS SINCERELY..........[XXX]    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6). *TR
